# Transmute Coinage to Gem (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 hour

**Components:** V, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** A stack of coins (of the same type)

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None (object)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

*Placing your hands on a stack of metallic coins of the same type, you convert them to a gem.*

This spell converts a stack of coins (of the same metallic type) into a raw, uncut gemstone. You transform 110 coins per caster level into a uncut gemstone that has a value equal to the transformed coins -10%.

**GM Note**

Spells, like *[[Crafter's Fortune (Spell)|crafter's fortune]]*, *[[Unseen Crafter (Spell)|unseen crafter]]*, etc., which increase a [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] roll can make this spell very valuable when using the Simple Gemcutting rules (see the [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill).
